hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: Gorons are stupid. They eat rocks. Except, apparently, the big rock blocking Dodongo's Cavern.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #the Blue Fire Arrows#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Shadow Trial Front Chest

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #the symphony room# in the Spirit Temple protects...^ #Arrows (30 pieces)# and #a Red Rupee#.
